name: Trapped VR (itch)
description:
Trapped is a VR interactive fictional game. The game is set in a game ruled by the Trickster. June gets trapped in Trickster's game and has to find her way out of the place before she loses time and is trapped in the game forever. She needs to find the keys and then solve the riddles and get out of the game.

Works with Cardboard VR.

Controls

Look down for movements.   Stare at the answer for 2 seconds to clear the riddle.

This game is a college project.

Gameplay Programming, Game Design and Game Art : Deepanjali Sarna
